member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType
member.summary: Map service types Some map service types may serve multiple map content types (f.ex. CacheService)

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType.Undefined
member.summary: Undefined service type

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType.VectorService
member.summary: Map service type producing rasterized vectordata, styled labeldata and feature queries

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType.RasterService
member.summary: Map service type producing rasterdata based on standarized raster formats

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType.CacheService
member.summary: Map service type combining data from multiple map services

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType.WmsService
member.summary: Web map service

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceType.PropagationService
member.summary: Propagation service for caculating radio/radar coverage

member.summary: Map service host categories

member.summary: Dont care

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceHostCategory.Local
member.summary: Use service running on local machine

member.summary: Use service running on remote machine

member.summary: Perfer service running on local machine

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapServiceHostCategory.PreferRemote
member.summary: Prefer service running on remote machine

member.summary: Composite map content.

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapContentType.Propagation
member.summary: Contains propagation data for caculating radio/radar coverage

member.summary: Contains elevation data stored as regular rasters of elevation values

member.summary: Contains terrain surface normal vectors, encoded as RGB=XYZ

member.summary: Contains bathymetry data

member.name: F:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapContentType.WmsMap

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceKey
member.summary: Key used for identifying a service session Session is the same for multiple clients if the service is a singleton. A new service key is generated if service is restarted.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceKey.SessionId
member.summary: Unique guid identifying a service session

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea
member.summary: Properties for map resolution area Map resolution areas are used to identify parts of a map constrained by map scale ranges and geographic areas

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.Resolution
member.summary: Maximum resolution for the area in meters/pixel.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.Latitude
member.summary: Resolution area center latitude, in degrees

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.Longitude
member.summary: Resolution area center longitude, in degrees

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.Width
member.summary: Resolution area width (delta longitude)

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.Height
member.summary: Resolution area height (delta latitude)

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.MinScale
member.summary: Minimum applicable map scale for this area Inverse scales, ex. 1:10000 is represented as 10000

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapResolutionArea.MaxScale
member.summary: Maximum applicable map scale for this area Inverse scales, ex. 1:10000 is represented as 10000

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.Bookmark
member.summary: Bookmarks entry Bookmarks are defined for a single mapsignature/mappackage

member.summary: Bookmark entry constructor used for setting default values

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.Bookmark.Name
member.summary: Bookmark descriptive name

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.Bookmark.Pos
member.summary: Position of bookmark entry

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.Bookmark.Scale
member.summary: Approximate scale of bookmark entry Inverse scales, ex. 1:10000 is represented as 10000

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.Bookmark.MapSig
member.summary: Valid map signature for bookmark entry

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.Bookmark.Desc
member.summary: String describing bookmark entry

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroup
member.summary: Logical map feature group Map feature groups are used for organizing map data in hierarchical groups representing similar features. Children are specialized types, eg. "Road" is general, "Road/Motorway" is specialized.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroup.ChildGroups
member.summary: Optional child groups

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroup.Name
member.summary: Feature group name

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroup.FeatureType
member.summary: Feature group geo type

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroups
member.summary: Logical map feature groups contained in a single multidataset

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroups.MinScale
member.summary: Multidataset minimum scale

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroups.MaxScale
member.summary: Multidataset maximum scale

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.FeatureGroups.ChildGroups
member.summary: List of available feature groups in multidataset

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry
member.summary: MapEntry describes an actual map available from a service. Each service typically has multiple map entries. Cache services must register all maps available from cached services

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.MapSignature
member.summary: Unique map signature. Service managers/admins are responsible for ensuring that this signature is the same for all services serving the same map

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.MapServiceType
member.summary: Note that all map signatures served by a cache services should be MapServiceType.CacheService. Use "MapType" to set actual map type

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.MapType
member.summary: Map content type. This describes the actual map type contained in this dataset.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.CurrentRevision
member.summary: Revision system may be expanded

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.ResolutionAreas
member.summary: List of valid resolution areas in this dataset

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.TileCacheSpec
member.summary: Supported tilings for this dataset. If empty, any tiling is assumed to be OK.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapEntry.FeatureGroups
member.summary: Supported feature groups in this dataset

member.name: T:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry
member.summary: One service entry per service May be expanded in the future to support new service types

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry.SessionId
member.summary: Each service is responsible for generating a Guid for the current session

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry.DefaultServiceType
member.summary: Default map service type, can be overridden by individual MapEntries,

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry.MapEntries
member.summary: Description of maps provided by the service

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry.ServiceTimeout
member.summary: Time in seconds from time of registering this ServiceEntry until service is flagged as expired

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry.ServiceRuntimeInfo
member.summary: Service info relevant to service selection and service monitoring

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.ServiceEntry.ServiceUri
member.summary: Prioritized list of service Uris. When connecting, later entries should be used if earlier entries fail.

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.MapServiceInterfaces.MapTemplateLayer.GroupFilter
member.summary: Template layer group filter Used for filtering in or out feature groups in layer. Each entry contains a group name. Child groups can be specified by using separator "/". "-" can be used to exclude groups.

member.summary: Template layer properties F.x. used to indicate if map labels should be visible

member.summary: Template layer minimum scale value

member.summary: Template layer maximum scale value
